title: Gross plot area :- Gross Plot Area means total area of land after deducting area under reservation or deemed reservation like amenity space if any, area under D
clause_text: Gross plot area :- Gross Plot Area means total area of land after deducting area under reservation or deemed reservation like amenity space if any, area under D.P. Road and Road widening.
